about_the_game:
Just Cat Slap is a game about two cats fighting for the love of a female cat. However, only one can win her affection! To prove who is truly worthy, they must face off in a slap duel. Quick reflexes will determine who truly deserves her love!

The gameplay is simple but challenging. You can only slap your opponent when the exclamation appears, so fast reflexes are key. The game features three difficulty levels and multiple endings depending on whether you win or lose. You can also enjoy local multiplayer with a friend using the same device.

Want to challenge a friend? Play local multiplayer on a single device and see who has the fastest reflexes!

This is my first game, developed entirely as a solo developer. I hope you have fun playing it!

The gameplay is simple but challenging. You can only slap your opponent when the exclamation appears, so fast reflexes are key. The game features three difficulty levels and multiple endings depending on whether you win or lose. You can also enjoy local multiplayer with a friend using the same device.

Want to challenge a friend? Play local multiplayer on a single device and see who has the fastest reflexes!

This is my first game, developed entirely as a solo developer. I hope you have fun playing it!
name: Just Cat Slap

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / AMD Athlon II X2 250
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 / NVIDIA GeForce 210 / AMD Radeon HD 5450
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 / AMD Radeon R7 240 / Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Two cats, one love. Both are competing for the heart of a beautiful female cat. But only one can win her affection! To prove who is more worthy, they must face off in an intense slap duel. Quick reflexes will decide who truly deserves her love!
supported_languages: English, Indonesian, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese
